data.title: DeLucca Gaucho Pizza & Wine
data.meta_description: Delucca is an elegant neighborhood pizzeria where you can enjoy the exciting theater of an open kitchen with its wood-fired oven and sexy Bossa Nova. A culinary experience unlike anything else.
data.meta_site_name: DeLucca Gaucho Pizza & Wine | Pizza Restaurant in Texas
data.text:
Book a Holiday Party, get $125

Book your holiday party for 10 or more by October 31, get a $125 dining card valid for January 1 - March 31, 2025.*

Learn More

Toast to Tuesdays

1/2 off wines by the glass & 1/2 off caipirinhas open to close!

Kids Eat for $11 - Limited Time Only

For a limited time, kids 12 and under can enjoy our five-course menu for just $11 every day.

Austin Dines for $19.95

For a limited time, Austin diners dine for $19.95. See you soon!

On Sundays, We Brunch.

Enjoy Brunch pizzas and juicy cocktails every Sunday from 12-3pm.

Online Ordering

Now Available at All Locations.

BRAZILIAN RODIZIO-STYLE SERVICE, GLOBAL FLAVORS.

An upscale pizzeria serving exceptional wines at a great value, craft cocktails, bossa nova and a continuous variety of savory and dessert pizzas. Itâ€™s an endless pizza experience perfect for a fun date night or group celebration.
